results.title: Music: the language of us all
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Dominique’s story is about the use of music as the most honest and universal form of free expression.
results.description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. results.title: The Goldrush had started
results.brief_description: A unique perspective on the Eureka Stockade story created by a Eureka 150 youth ambassador in a special Digital Storytelling Workshop to celebrate 150 years since the famous rebellion. Ben from Alfredton tells the story of his great, great, great, great grandfather who travelled to Australia in search of gold in 1851.

results.title: Until you break
results.brief_description: Elliot Spencer has exceptional music video skills as well as a distinctive visual style. In this piece he explores the notions of masculinity, community dynamics and success & achievement in a dangerous sport.
results.description: Elliot Spencer has exceptional music video skills as well as a distinctive visual style. In this piece he explores the notions of masculinity, community dynamics and success & achievement in a dangerous sport.

group_siblings.title: Everything was perfect and then I went insane

results.title: Screaming red
results.brief_description: WINNER: Diegesis Festival 2003. This well scripted story is painfully easy to relate to with strong character development and use of sound that shows the assurance of a seasoned short filmmaker. Ruthanne describes her film as “A metaphysical journey of the heart, revealing layers of the teenage psyche.”

results.title: Panic time
results.brief_description: This slow build suspenseful short efficiently builds anticipation through a series of very polished point-of-view shots The scene is set with a mysterious girl in an anonymous hotel room.

results.title: Cliche
results.brief_description: “What fears do I have but fear itself? Am I in control? Can the nightmare journey I am on be transcended?” This sophisticated student film shows influences from avant-garde French cinema and features an exceptional original soundtrack.

results.title: Memories
results.brief_description: Memories of the early years of Moomba, particularly of the pageant and my involvement in those early years. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: A Moomba Magic Moment
results.brief_description: It all started with my promotional photo and my girlfriend Gail Gordon, she entered me into the Moomba Quest, and the rest is history. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: Moom
results.brief_description: Mum and I would laugh at how the Moomba festival was named after our deadly mooms. Moom refers to our bottoms. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.
